title: U.S. orders second aircraft carrier to Middle East as Trump pressures Iran
summary_full: The USS Gerald R. Ford, deployed since June, will cross the Atlantic for a second time despite a Navy warning that the warship needs maintenance.
summary_public: The USS Gerald R. Ford, deployed since June, will cross the Atlantic for a second time despite a Navy warning that the warship needs maintenance.

IR.label: negative
